caption.p: Daily precipitation distribution. Distribution of daily precipitation for all models, good group, bad group, as well as that observed by Atmospheric Radiation Measurement (ARM) Program during 1996â€“2005 at the SGP site. The inset plot is the boxplot of daily precipitation. The boxes indicate the 10%-quantile, 25%-quantile, median, 75%-quantile, and 90%-quantile, respectively. Solid triangles stand for the mean values
